message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $750,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $850,000, which still allows for a healthy profit for you. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $850,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $800,000. This is my final offer.
